name: Espresso
steps: 1. Grind coffee beans. 2. Brew using espresso machine.

name: Cappuccino
steps: 1. Brew one shot of espresso. 2. Steam milk until creamy. 3. Pour steamed milk over espresso. 4. Top with milk foam.

name: Latte
ingredients: Espresso, Steamed milk, Optional: Sugar or syrup
steps: 1. Brew one shot of espresso. 2. Steam milk until smooth and creamy. 3. Pour steamed milk over espresso. 4. Sweeten with sugar or syrup if desired.

name: mocca
ingredients: Espresso, Steamed milk, Optional: Sugar or syrup
steps: 1. Brew one shot of espresso. 2. Steam milk until smooth and creamy. 3. Pour steamed milk over espresso. 4. Sweeten with sugar or syrup if desired.
